div.t-if: o.move_lines and o.move_lines[0].partner_id and o.move_lines[0].partner_id.id != o.partner_id.id
o.picking_type_id.code != 'internal' and (not o.move_lines or not o.move_lines[0].partner_id) and o.picking_type_id.warehouse_id.partner_id

t.t-value: any([move_lines.product_id and move_lines.product_id.sudo().barcode or move_lines.package_id for move_lines in o.move_line_ids])

t.t-if: move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Sauces' or move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Chips' or move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Epices FUCHS' or move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Mainou'

t.span: No reservation or quantity done yet.

div.t-if: o.move_lines and o.move_lines[0].partner_id and o.move_lines[0].partner_id.id != o.partner_id.id
o.picking_type_id.code != 'internal' and (not o.move_lines or not o.move_lines[0].partner_id) and o.picking_type_id.warehouse_id.partner_id

t.t-value: any([move_lines.product_id and move_lines.product_id.sudo().barcode or move_lines.package_id for move_lines in o.move_line_ids])

t.t-if: move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Saucissons' or move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Chapelet' or move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Mortadelle' or move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Blocs' or move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Panes' or move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Tranches' or move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Negoce Frais'

t.span: No reservation or quantity done yet.

div.t-if: o.move_lines and o.move_lines[0].partner_id and o.move_lines[0].partner_id.id != o.partner_id.id
o.picking_type_id.code != 'internal' and (not o.move_lines or not o.move_lines[0].partner_id) and o.picking_type_id.warehouse_id.partner_id

t.t-value: any([move_lines.product_id and move_lines.product_id.sudo().barcode or move_lines.package_id for move_lines in o.move_line_ids])

t.span: No reservation or quantity done yet.

div.t-if: o.move_lines and o.move_lines[0].partner_id and o.move_lines[0].partner_id.id != o.partner_id.id
o.picking_type_id.code != 'internal' and (not o.move_lines or not o.move_lines[0].partner_id) and o.picking_type_id.warehouse_id.partner_id

t.t-value: any([move_lines.product_id and move_lines.product_id.sudo().barcode or move_lines.package_id for move_lines in o.move_line_ids])

t.t-if: move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Volaille' or move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Volailles Espagne' or move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='La Volailles BON' or move.product_id.categ_id.parent_id.name =='Volailles IMEX'

t.span: No reservation or quantity done yet.

div.p: You do not have any products reserved for this picking. Please click the 'Reserve' button to check if products are available.
